GoalDesc: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
TargetDesc: Support and strengthen the participation of local communities in improving water and sanitation management
IndicatorDesc: Proportion of local administrative units with established and operational policies and procedures for participation of local communities in water and sanitation management
SeriesDesc: Countries with users/communities participating in planning programs in water resources planning and management, by level of participation (3 = High; 2 = Moderate; 1 = Low; 0 = NA)
Source: Key indicators of the UN-Water Global Analysis and Assessment of Sanitation and Drinking-Water (GLAAS). For the specific sources by country, refer to http://www.who.int/water_sanitation_health/monitoring/investments/glaas/en/.
Footnotes: Observation value: 3 = High level of participation; 2 = Moderate level of participation; 1 = Low level of participation; 0 = Not applicable.

Footnotes: Observation value: 3 = High level of participation; 2 = Moderate level of participation; 1 = Low level of participation; 0 = Not applicable.
